data.title: Jimmy Carter – Prize presentation
data.meta_description: The Nobel Peace Prize 2002 was awarded to Jimmy Carter "for his decades of untiring effort to find peaceful solutions to international conflicts, to advance democracy and human rights, and to promote economic and social development"
data.text:
Jimmy Carter

Prize presentation

Your browser does not support the video tag.

Watch a video clip of the 2002 Nobel Peace Prize Laureate, Jimmy Carter, receiving his Nobel Prize medal and diploma during the Nobel Peace Prize Award Ceremony at the Oslo City Hall in Norway, 10 December 2002.

To cite this section
